original_title: Howard Jones: Live in Salt Lake City
overview: International pop star Howard Jones is captured Live in this concert from Salt Lake City, performing 20 years of some of the best pop music ever written, including his biggest hits, and behind the scenes interviews with Howard.  Recorded at the University of Utah Huntsman Special Events Center, Saturday, April 20, 1996 at 7:30 p.m.
title: Howard Jones: Live in Salt Lake City
